help.best-performance: It's the option with the best performance
help.once-installed: Once installed, click the 'local client' button, that will download the virtual desktop file
help.no-install: There's no need to install any external program, {worse-performance}. You simply need to click the button and it will open the virtual desktop in a new tab

text.macos: macOS is an unsupported platform. You need to use the browser option
